sentences.en: ‘Don’t go to sleep,’ she said, prodding me in the ribs.
sentences.cn: “别睡着。”她边说边捅我的肋骨。

sentences.en: Halsey gave Victor Henry a jocular prod with two fingers.
sentences.cn: 海尔赛打趣地用两个手指戳了维克多·亨利一下.

sentences.en: Halsey gave Victor Henry jocular prod with two fingers.
sentences.cn: 地用两个手指戳了维克多·亨利一下.

sentences.en: He gave the donkey a mighty prod in the backside.
sentences.cn: 他用力捅了一下驴屁股。

sentences.en: He has a short fuse , and they poke and prod to see if he will explode.
sentences.cn: 他易于激动, 因此他们故意拨弄他,看看他是否会发火.

sentences.en: He needs a crisis to prod him into action.
sentences.cn: 他要事到临头才被迫采取行动.

sentences.en: He's forgetful , so I'll give his memory a prod.
sentences.cn: 他很健忘, 所以我要提醒他一下.

sentences.en: Her orary matured, and under the prod of her hormone I started developing.
sentences.cn: 她的卵巢成熟, 在卵巢激素的督促下,我开始发育.

sentences.en: I shall have to prod him to pay me what he owes.
sentences.cn: 我将不得不催促他把欠我的钱还给我.

sentences.en: If you do not receive an answer quickly, give them a prod.
sentences.cn: 你要是不能很快得到答复, 不妨催他们一下.

sentences.en: If you don't receive an answer quickly, give them a prod.
sentences.cn: 你要是不能很快得到答覆, 不妨催他们一下.

sentences.en: Satire serves to prod people an awareness of truth.
sentences.cn: 讽刺作品有助于促进人们认识真相.

sentences.en: She gave him a prod with her finger.
She gave the man a prod with her umbrella.
sentences.cn: 她用伞捅了那男子一下.

sentences.en: There was a limit to how far he could let the General prod him.
sentences.cn: 他难得无限地一味听从将军的驱策.

sentences.en: You'd better give her memory a prod.

trans.tran_en: a pointed instrument used for pushing animals, to make them move

trans.tran_cn: 戳， 刺； 刺激， 激励
trans.tran_en: to quickly push something or someone with your finger or a pointed object

trans.tran_cn: 刺激，促使…行动，（用手指或尖物）戳，捅
